item.title: 亚洲银行助推中东地区 20 多亿美元贷款热潮
item.description: 中东借款人正在增加在亚太地区的银团贷款，因为他们希望在全球债券和国内市场之外实现筹资多样化。【原文：Middle East borrowers are ramping up loans that are being syndicated in Asia Pacific as they look to diversify fundraising beyond global bond and domestic markets.】

item.title: 市场时间延长，全球交易商青睐韩元，韩元流动性上升
item.description: 韩国为实现货币全球化所做的努力正在取得进展，在韩国延长在岸市场交易时间一年后，韩元交易量不断扩大。【原文：South Korea’s efforts to globalize its currency are gaining traction, with won trading expanding a year after the nation extended onshore market hours.】

item.title: 中国基金击败 97% 的同行，买入大众超市，抛售茅台酒
item.description: 今年，一位年仅 30 岁的中国基金经理凭借其投资组合中受 Z 世代青睐的公司（如大卖场国际集团）击败了同行，他押注新时代的购物趋势能帮助他的基金克服中国经济的低迷。【原文：A 30-year old Chinese fund manager is trouncing peers this year with a portfolio stocked with Gen Z-favored names like Pop Mart International Group, betting that new-age shopping trends can help his fund overcome the country’s economic sluggishness.】

item.title: 原油回落，菲律宾比索重拾升势
item.description: 油价下跌提振了严重依赖石油进口的菲律宾经济的前景，菲律宾比索最糟糕的时期可能已经过去。【原文：The worst may be over for the Philippine peso as falling oil prices boost the outlook for an economy that’s heavily reliant on oil imports.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 尽管石油和天然气仍在源源不断地输送，但中东局势依然微妙。但对于美国炼油商来说，对该地区供应的依赖程度已今非昔比。美国电网规模的电池安装量预计将扭转快速上升的趋势。再看看在酷热袭击欧洲之际，玉米和小麦之间的价差发生了什么变化。【原文：The situation in the Middle East remains delicate, even as oil — and gas — continue to flow. But for US refiners, reliance on supply from the region is not as great as it once was. Grid-scale battery installations in the US are projected to reverse their rapid rise. And look what’s happening with the spread between corn and wheat as intense heat batters Europe.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行应放弃新的 2.5% 通胀目标，TCorp 的 Redican 说
item.description: 主权投资管理公司TCorp的首席经济学家布莱恩-雷迪肯（Brian Redican）认为，澳大利亚央行应放弃实现2-3%通胀区间中点的新目标，因为该基准给决策者带来了不切实际的预期。【原文：Australia’s central bank should ditch a new goal of hitting the midpoint of its 2-3% inflation band as the benchmark imposes unrealistic expectations on policymakers, according to Brian Redican, chief economist at sovereign investment manager TCorp.】

item.title: Optiver 迁至悉尼新办事处，寻求交易优势
item.description: Optiver 是受惠于蓬勃发展的做市商行业的高速交易公司之一，本周一，该公司将其最后一批 460 名当地员工迁入五层光鲜亮丽的悉尼办公室。【原文：Optiver, part of a coterie of high-speed trading firms benefiting from a booming market-making industry, shifted the final batch of its 460-strong local staff into a five-floor glossy Sydney office on Monday.】

item.title: 2025 年交易者的错误之处
item.description:
特朗普的关税和税收政策考验了对美元、市场和债券的假设

。【原文：

Trump's tariff and tax policies test assumptions on the US Dollar, markets and bonds

】

item.title: 债券交易员等待 6 月就业报告为利率政策指明方向
item.description: 债券投资者进入假期缩短的一周，重点关注 6 月份的就业报告，因为该报告是影响美联储利率走势和今年下半年市场表现的关键数据。【原文：Bond investors enter a holiday-shortened week focused on the June jobs report as a key data point that will influence the Federal Reserve’s path on rates and performance for the market for the rest of the year.】

item.title: Torrent 将以 14 亿美元收购 KKR 在 JB Pharma 的股份
item.description: Torrent Pharmaceuticals Ltd.同意从私募股权公司 KKR & Co.手中收购 JB Chemicals & Pharmaceuticals Ltd.的控股权，这是印度交易热潮的最新迹象。【原文：Torrent Pharmaceuticals Ltd. agreed to take a controlling stake in JB Chemicals & Pharmaceuticals Ltd. from private equity firm KKR & Co., the latest sign of a dealmaking boom in India.】

item.title: 阿尔伯塔基金在清理高管后离职费用飙升 383
item.description: 艾伯塔投资管理公司向一位离职的首席投资官支付了近 600 万加元（约合 440 万美元）的遣散费和其他福利，这位首席投资官的任期约为 20 个月。【原文：Alberta Investment Management Corp. paid nearly C$6 million ($4.4 million) in severance and other benefits to a departing chief investment officer who was in the job for about 20 months.】

item.title: 特朗普称 TikTok 有买家，但不愿透露姓名
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他已为中国公司字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd.）旗下社交媒体应用 TikTok 在美国的业务确定了买家，但两周内不会提供详细信息。【原文：President Donald Trump said he has identified a buyer for the US operations of TikTok social media app owned by Chinese company ByteDance Ltd., but he won’t provide details for two weeks.】

item.title: 尽管金价上涨，澳大利亚仍下调大宗商品出口展望
item.description: 澳大利亚下调了商品出口收益预测，原因是黄金价格的飞速上涨未能抵消铁矿石和天然气的疲软。【原文：Australia cut its forecast earnings from commodity exports, as a meteoric rise in gold prices fails to offset weakness in iron ore and natural gas.】

item.title: 澳大利亚初创企业缺乏现金，尽管潜在回报巨大
item.description: 澳大利亚初创企业在融资方面远远落后于美国和中国，尽管澳大利亚在创造独角兽企业方面历来卓有成效。【原文：Australian startups lag far behind the US and China in funding raised despite the country’s historical effectiveness at creating unicorns.】

item.title: 中东紧张局势消退，期权市场显示交易者重新布局
item.description: 上周股市创下历史新高，中东紧张局势缓解后能源期货回落。但在期权市场的某些部分，仍有紧张迹象，因为投资者在为潜在的地缘政治和宏观经济动荡做准备。【原文：Stocks hit record highs last week and energy futures retreated after Middle East tensions eased. But in some parts of the options markets, there are still signs of stress as investors position for potential geopolitical and macroeconomic upsets.】

item.title: 新兴市场 "特立独行者 "瞄准区域基金以获取丰厚回报
item.description: 在新兴市场大放异彩的一年里，回报最好的是那些瞄准地区指数而忽视亚洲市场的全球基准的投资者。【原文：In a banner year for emerging markets, the best returns have gone to investors who targeted regional indexes and ignored the Asia-heavy global benchmarks.】

item.title: 苹果应出售智能手环以扩大其健身追踪器阵容
item.description: 苹果公司应该认真考虑开发一款智能戒指，为其健身追踪可穿戴设备的推广注入新的动力，并拓宽其市场。此外：公司暗示将推出系绳式 Vision Pro，iOS 26 和其他操作系统也将推出新的测试版。【原文：Apple should seriously consider developing a smart ring to give its fitness-tracking wearables push new momentum and widen its market. Also: The company hints at a tethered Vision Pro, and there are new beta versions of iOS 26 and other operating systems.】

item.title: 贸易谈判步伐加快，印度谈判代表延长美国驻留时间
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，印度贸易团队已延长了在华盛顿的逗留时间，以消除分歧，因为双方希望在7月9日美国提高关税的最后期限前达成协议。【原文：India’s trade team has extended its stay in Washington to iron out differences as the two sides look to clinch a deal before a July 9 deadline when higher US tariffs are set to kick in, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 沙特外国直接投资流入预示着推动外国现金的势头
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯迎来了自 2022 年以来外国直接投资最强劲的一年，这是沙特王国在推动吸引海外资本支持其经济雄心方面取得一些进展的早期信号。【原文：Saudi Arabia saw its strongest start to a year for foreign direct investment since 2022, in an early signal the kingdom is gaining some traction in its push to attract overseas capital to support its economic ambitions.】

item.title: 国际清算银行（BIS）称，关税威胁美联储，令其真正头痛的是通胀问题
item.description: 国际清算银行（Bank for International Settlements）警告说，随着世界经济因唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的破坏性贸易政策而陷入困境，美国通胀可能卷土重来。【原文：Resurgent US inflation could unfold as the world economy reels from Donald Trump’s disruptive trade policies, the Bank for International Settlements warned.】

item.title: 法国有信心在最后期限前达成关税协议
item.description: 法国财政部长埃里克-隆巴德（Eric Lombard）表示，欧盟可以在7月9日最后期限之前与美国达成某种形式的贸易协议，届时华盛顿将对几乎所有欧盟产品征收50%的关税。【原文：French finance minister Eric Lombard said the European Union can clinch some form of a trade agreement with the US before a July 9 deadline, when Washington is set to impose a 50% tariff on nearly all EU products.】

item.title: 日本石场说：缓解通胀的措施必须迅速
item.description: 日本首相石破茂（Shigeru Ishiba）周日表示，任何缓解日本通胀的措施都必须迅速，并且不应妨碍政府为社会服务提供资金的能力。【原文：Any measures to ease inflation in Japan must be speedy and shouldn’t impede the government’s ability to fund social services, Japan’s Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba said on Sunday, in a comment reflecting his aversion to sales tax cuts as opposition parties campaign to lower the duty ahead of a key election next month.】

item.title: 韩国总统李明博提名财政部长处理经济增长和贸易问题
item.description: 韩国总统李在明提名 Koo Yun-cheol 为下一任财政部长，在经济增长乏力和特朗普政府贸易压力日益增大之际，转向一位资深官僚来指导经济。【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae-myung nominated Koo Yun-cheol as the next finance minister, turning to a veteran bureaucrat to guide the economy at a time of sluggish growth and mounting trade pressures from the Trump administration.】

item.title: 台湾称美国贸易谈判取得 "建设性进展
item.description: 台湾表示，它在与美国的第二轮贸易谈判中取得了 "建设性进展"，谈判的目的是避免美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收关税。【原文：Taiwan said it’s made “constructive progress” in a second round of trade talks with the US, which are aimed at avoiding tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 韩国结束对泡菜债券投资长达 14 年的限制
item.description: 韩国正在废除一项长达 14 年之久的禁令，即禁止地方机构投资出售给国内使用的所谓 "泡菜债券"，此举旨在改善外汇流动性，缓解韩元压力。【原文：South Korea is scrapping a 14-year-old ban on local institutions investing in so-called Kimchi bonds sold for domestic use, in a move aimed at improving foreign exchange liquidity and easing pressure on the won.】

item.title: 中国重申反对任何牺牲本国利益的贸易协议
item.description: 商务部周六晚间发表声明称，中国坚决反对任何国家与美国达成以牺牲中国利益为代价换取关税减免的贸易协定。【原文：China firmly opposes any countries reaching trade agreements with the US that would sacrifice Chinese interests in exchange for tariff relief, according to a statement from the Ministry of Commerce on Saturday night.】

item.title: 马来西亚机构瞄准已故大亨的 10 亿美元资产：NST
item.description: 据《新海峡时报》（New Straits Times）报道，马来西亚反贪局正在锁定已故富豪、前财政部长戴姆-扎因丁（Daim Zainuddin）在其他五个国家至少价值 45 亿林吉特（约合 10 亿美元）的资产。【原文：Malaysia’s anti-graft agency is targeting assets worth at least 4.5 billion ringgit ($1 billion) in five other countries belonging to the late tycoon and former finance minister Daim Zainuddin, the New Straits Times reported.】

item.title: 印度 5.4 万亿美元的股票市场正逐渐失去在亚洲的优势
item.description: 4 月份，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）大范围提高关税，震撼了全球市场。随着贸易担忧的缓解，投资者正在失去持有一些全球最昂贵股票的动力。【原文：India’s relatively insulated economy saw its stocks emerge as a haven when US President Donald Trump’s wide-ranging tariff hikes shook global markets in April. With trade concerns easing, investors are losing the incentive to own some of the world’s most expensive shares.】

item.title: 受制裁影响，俄罗斯再次尝试扩大液化天然气出口
item.description: 在去年美国制裁导致液化天然气出口受阻后，俄罗斯正再次努力扩大液化天然气出口。【原文：Russia is taking another crack at expanding exports of liquefied natural gas after US sanctions stalled efforts last year.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会 EDGAR 系统的两名工作人员被控进行内幕交易
item.description: 两名曾在美国证券交易委员会 EDGAR 公共申报系统工作的男子被控内幕交易罪，据称他们通过窃取工作中获得的非公开信息，从中获利 100 万美元。【原文：Two men who worked for the Securities and Exchange Commission’s EDGAR public filing system were charged with insider trading after allegedly pocketing $1 million by stealing non-public information obtained through their jobs.】
